name: Bone Gift
description: A great gift for unusual friends!

name: Love Letter
description: Gift this to an NPC to start dating them.

name: Memory Loss Potion
description: It looks less like a liquid and more like an eerie sort of fog... like a mental haze, obscuring memory and committing it to oblivion.

name: Iron Ore
description: I can smelt this into a bar.

name: Gold Ore
description: I've struck gold! I can smelt this into a bar.

name: Coal
description: A hard lump of coal, mined from deep within the earth.

name: Sparkling Dust
description: Shiny flakes of rock and crystal left behind by the passing of wind sprites, Nel'Varians love using it to add sparkle to their creations.

name: Tough Dragon Scale
description: The thick scale of a baby dragon, shed and left behind. It's said that dragon scales can be used in alchemy.

name: Sparkling Dragon Scale
description: The shimmering scale of a baby dragon, shed and left behind. It's said that dragon scales can be used in alchemy.

name: Sharp Dragon Scale
description: The jagged scale of a baby dragon, shed and left behind. It's said that dragon scales can be used in alchemy.

name: Enhanced Copper Bar
description: A copper bar, enhanced with Withergate concrete and dark magic.

name: Enchanted Copper Bar
description: A copper bar, enchanted with Elven magic.

name: Iron Bar
description: A bar of refined iron. Harder than copper, it will make excellent equipment.

name: Gold Bar
description: A solid gold bar, literally worth its weight in gold!

name: Silk
description: A soft sheet of silk, great for crafting.

name: Starfish
description: Neither a fish nor a star, but still pretty neat looking.

name: Clam
description: This would go great in a nice chowder.

name: Feather
description: The fledgling feathers of baby griffons are famously known for their softness.

name: Peanuts
description: Coveted by squirrels, these shelled nuts are often left behind as gifts to those who have befriended the furry critters.

name: Wool
description: A bundle of pure wool, this animal product will sell for a fair price.

name: Cookies
description: The specialty of grandmas the world over.

name: Coffee
description: Sleep is a poor substitute for coffee.

name: Apple Jam
description: Sweet jam made from apples, plenty of sugar and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your farming skill.

name: Blueberry Jam
description: Sweet jam made from blueberries, plenty of sugar and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your fishing skill.

name: Raspberry Jam
description: Sweet jam made from raspberries, plenty of sugar and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your mining skill.

name: Strawberry Jam
description: Sweet jam made from strawberries, plenty of sugar and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your combat skill.

name: Orange Jam
description: Sweet jam made from oranges, plenty of sugar and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your exploration skill.

name: Peach Jam
description: Sweet jam made from peaches, plenty of sugar and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your farming and fishing skills.

name: Tomato Jam
description: A yummy tasting jam made from tomatoes. I bet in the future they'll put this on everything. Eating this will give you a boost to your combat and farming skills.

name: Banana Jam
description: Sweet jam made from bananas, plenty of sugar and infused with mana. Eating this will give you a boost to your farming and exploration skills.

name: Mana Potion
description: A potion of distilled mana essense, it provides a quick boost to your energy.

name: Health Potion
description: A potent restoratrive tonic, it hastens recovery and mends wounds.

name: Small Blue Glorite Crystal
description:
Crystalized mana and power, in the form of blue glorite. It can be drained to increase your maximum mana. Elios warned you of the negative effects of consuming glorite's power... but he isn't here right now, is he?

"Blue glorite is said to fuel Dynus's inexhaustible mana reserves."

name: Small Purple Glorite Crystal
description:
Crystalized mana and power, in the form of purple glorite. It can be drained to increase your maximum mana. Elios warned you of the negative effects of consuming glorite's power... but he isn't here right now, is he?

"Blue glorite is said to fuel Dynus's inexhaustible mana reserves."

name: Small Magenta Glorite Crystal
description:
Crystalized mana and power, in the form of magenta glorite. It can be drained to increase your maximum mana. Elios warned you of the negative effects of consuming glorite's power... but he isn't here right now, is he?

"Blue glorite is said to fuel Dynus's inexhaustible mana reserves."

name: Small Red Glorite Crystal
description:
Crystalized mana and power, in the form of red glorite. It can be drained to increase your maximum mana. Elios warned you of the negative effects of consuming glorite's power... but he isn't here right now, is he?

"Blue glorite is said to fuel Dynus's inexhaustible mana reserves."

name: Berry Fruit Salad
description: A refreshing berry salad. A classic for warm springtime days, or any other day for that matter.

name: Two Peas and a Pod
description: One pea, two pea; eat pea, no pea.

name: Rice Pilaf
description: Much more involved than normal rice, but worth the effort.

name: Roasted Turnip
description: Considered peasant food in the Eastern Region, roast turnip is somewhat of a delicacy in the west.

name: Steak
description: The steaks are high- highly delicious.

name: Chocolate Milk
description: Perhaps the greatest culinary invention of all time.

name: Yogurt
description: Cultured milk fats' sounds gross, but in reality it tastes great!

name: Apple Juice
description: It doesn't get anymore classic than a cool glass of apple juice.

name: Orange Juice
description: Full of vitamin C: you want to drink it every time you C it!

name: Carrot Juice
description: Favored drink of rabbit Amari.

name: Ginger Juice
description: This stuff is said to have all sorts of health benefits... if you can tolerate drinking it!

name: Pineapple Juice
description: Souther Islanders love making tropical mixed drinks with this juice.

name: Kale Juice
description: Maybe not the sweetest juice ever, but it's super healthy. That's pretty cool, right? Right?

name: Sugarcane Juice
description: So what if it's pure sugar syrup? It's juice! Therefore it's healthy!

name: Yucky Green Juice
description: Eh... you've drank worse.

name: Strawberry Juice
description: A delicious and refreshing juice, the perfect beverage for any meal.

name: Island Skewer
description: Tropical fruits lightly grilled on a skewer, refreshingly crispy.

name: Simple Earth Fertilizer
description: Fertilizer rich with the magic of earth, increasing your crop's harvest.

name: Simple Fire Fertilizer
description: Fertilizer rich with the magic of fire, increasing the speed your crops grow.

name: Simple Water Fertilizer
description: Fertilizer rich with the magic of water, increasing your crop's chance to stay watered over night.

name: Basic Fish Bait
description: A simple bait made from simple ingredients.

name: Worm
description: Thankfully it isn't half a worm...

name: Mana Fertilizer
description: Because in Nel'Vari, EVERYTHING is infused with mana.

name: Simple Sand Fertilizer
description: Fertilizer that utilizes an old Elven trick to retain moisture in soil.

name: Training Dummy
description: Give it your best shot!

name: Small Potted Bush
description: A common bush, planted in a clay vase.

name: Red Rug
description: Just a simple, plush red rug.

name: Clay Pot
description: A simple clay pot, made right here in Sun Haven.

name: Red Rose Vase
description: A single red rose, how dramatic, how romantic.

name: Cloak Rack
description: Usually used exclusively by desk workers, this light would nonetheless look great in your home.

name: Bunny Poster
description: Hang this on your wall to show off your bunny pride.

name: Small Sunflower
description: It's small now, but these flowers can get absolutely gigantic!

name: House
description: Place your house!

name: Feeding Station
description: A food trough for your barn animals. Animal food can be placed on this to fill it up, giving your animals food for the day.

name: Automatic Feeder
description: A new piece of engineering developed in the Great City. When filled with animal feed, it will automatically dispense food to your animals everyday.

name: Automatic Collector
description: A new piece of engineering developed in the Great City. This will automatically collect your animal's products each day.

name: Spring Scarecrow
description: A scarecrow to frighten off spring pests that seek to steal your crops.

name: Cooking Pot
description: A trusty cooking pot where you can cook ingredients and crops into yummy meals.

name: Loom
description: This spinning loom can turn silk and other materials into quilts, blankets, gloves and even fishing nets!

name: Baker's Station
description: An advanced cooking station for making breads and other oven baked goodies.

name: Fish Grill
description: Grills are a staple of Southern Isle cooking, able to perfectly cook fish into fantastic meals.

name: Furnace
description: I can smelt ore into bars with this.

name: Exploration Totem
description: An enchanted totem that provides some benefits for your farm!

name: Combat Totem
description: An enchanted totem that provides some benefits for your farm!

name: Tile Maker
description: A table for cutting and shaping materials into floor tiles for your farm.

name: Basic Furniture Table
description:
A specialized carpentry bench, you can make furniture and decorations with this.
More expensive than buying furniture in a store, but the convenience is nice.

name: Composter
description: A farming essential, composters turn resources into compost and fertilizer.

name: Fall Scarecrow
description: A simple scarecrow to frighten off fall pests that seek to steal your crops.

name: Summer Scarecrow
description: A scarecrow to frighten off summer pests that seek to steal your crops.

name: Winter Scarecrow
description: A simple scarecrow to frighten off winter pests that seek to steal your crops.

name: Fishing Totem
description: An enchanted totem that provides some benefits for your farm!

name: Mining Totem
description: An enchanted totem that provides some benefits for your farm!

name: Farming Totem
description: An enchanted totem that provides some benefits for your farm!

name: Fall Totem
description: A seasonal totem to ward off rootweeds that entangle your crops.

name: Spring Totem
description: A seasonal totem that provides some benefits for your farm!

name: Summer Totem
description: A seasonal totem that protects nearby crops from being burnt.

name: Winter Totem
description: A seasonal totem that protects nearby crops from being frozen.

name: Crop Totem
description: An enchanted totem that provides some benefits for your farm!

name: Gem Trophy
description: A golden trophy, awarded for completing the gem bundle of the Sun Haven Museum.

name: Combat Trophy
description: A golden trophy, awarded for completing the combat bundle of the Sun Haven museum.

name: Explorer's Trophy
description: A golden trophy, awarded for completing the exploration bundle of the Sun Haven Museum.

name: Fishing Trophy
description: A golden trophy, awarded for completing the fishing bundle of the Sun Haven Museum.

name: Kraken Kale
description: Many monsters claim this strange crop tastes great when served with noodles. Maybe you'll just take their word for it.

name: Guava Berry
description: Every part of this fruit is edible, from the seeds to the rind!

name: Turnip
description: Turn up with turnip, if you know what's good for you.

name: Heat Fruit
description: The fruit literal glows with heat. Watch your fingers!

name: Kale
description: It might not taste like much, but kale is super healthy.

name: Armoranth
description: This poofy flower might look soft, but its petals are as hard as iron.

name: Garlic
description: Pungent as garlic may be, it's a great addition to many dishes.

name: Mango
description: It's like an apple's tropical island cousin.

name: Orchid
description: In some areas of the land an orchid represents strength and loyalty, in others it is an omen of bad luck.

name: Red Rose
description: Brilliant red roses are a symbol of royalty and everlasting love, a staple in romantic bouquets.

name: Blue Rose
description: Graceful blue roses are a symbol of peace and elegance, in the Eastern Region these roses replace the red variety in wedding ceremonies.

name: Daisy
description: Wild daisies like these grow all along the countryside, though this is a domesticated species.

name: Fishing Permit Tier 1
description: An official piece of paper permitting you to deploy a low number of fishing nets. Increase fishing net capacity by 2. Only one tier 1 fishing permit can be used per world.

name: Land Permit Tier 1
description: An official piece of paper permitting you to deploy a high number of crops. Increase crop capacity by 10. Only one tier 1 land permit can be used per world.

name: Roasted Black Bass
description: Fish, perfectly roasted over the coals of a hot grill.

name: Roasted Dorado
description: Fish, perfectly roasted over the coals of a hot grill.

name: Roasted Flower Flounder
description: Fish, perfectly roasted over the coals of a hot grill.

name: Roasted Old Boot
description: Roasted to a perfect medium rare.

name: Roasted Rainbow Trout
description: Fish, perfectly roasted over the coals of a hot grill.

name: Roasted Sea Bass
description: Fish, perfectly roasted over the coals of a hot grill.

name: Roasted Tuna
description: Fish, perfectly roasted over the coals of a hot grill.

name: Grilled Blue Tang
description: Fish, perfectly roasted over the coals of a hot grill.

name: Grilled Carp
description: Fish, perfectly roasted over the coals of a hot grill.

name: Grilled Catfish
description: Fish, perfectly roasted over the coals of a hot grill.

name: Grilled Crab
description: Fish, perfectly roasted over the coals of a hot grill.

name: Grilled Frostfin
description: Fish, perfectly roasted over the coals of a hot grill.

name: Grilled Whitebelly Shark
description: Fish, perfectly roasted over the coals of a hot grill.

name: Leaf Wrapped Averagemouth Bass
description: Wrapped in a seasoned leaf and buried in smoking embers, a cooking method favored especially by Naga.

name: Leaf Wrapped Bashful Pike
description: Wrapped in a seasoned leaf and buried in smoking embers, a cooking method favored especially by Naga.

name: Leaf Wrapped Blue Gill
description: Wrapped in a seasoned leaf and buried in smoking embers, a cooking method favored especially by Naga.

name: Leaf Wrapped Cuddlefish
description: Wrapped in a seasoned leaf and buried in smoking embers, a cooking method favored especially by Naga.

name: Leaf Wrapped Ribbon Eel
description: Wrapped in a seasoned leaf and buried in smoking embers, a cooking method favored especially by Naga.

name: Leaf Wrapped Searback
description: Wrapped in a seasoned leaf and buried in smoking embers, a cooking method favored especially by Naga.

name: Leaf Wrapped Silver Carp
description: Wrapped in a seasoned leaf and buried in smoking embers, a cooking method favored especially by Naga.

name: Leaf Wrapped Tiger Trout
description: Wrapped in a seasoned leaf and buried in smoking embers, a cooking method favored especially by Naga.

name: Drinking Chocolate
description: Known less formally as hot chocolate, this brew is the essential drink for the chilly winter season.

name: Mulled Cider
description: Cider that has been heated, or mulled, with holiday spices and fruit.

name: Spiced Cider
description: Cider topped with a froth of potent spices.

name: Elios Gingerbread Cookie
description: It looks just like Elios, even though it's a cookie!

name: Holiday Hot Cocoa
description: Cocoa thickened with peppermint, it's hot AND cool.

name: Fruit Cupcake
description: A cute mini version of the holiday fruit cake.

name: Figgy Pudding
description: Get figgy with it.

name: Gingerbread Man
description: This one didn't run away home.

name: Milk and Cookies
description: Santa food.

name: Raspberry Doughnuts
description: Raspberries aren't in season during the winter, so these doughnuts are made with sweetened preserves.

name: Gingerbread House
description: Knock knock, anyone home?

name: Panettone
description: A fluffy and delicate fruit cake, just in time for winter.

name: Eyeball Pizza
description: You never thought pizza could beat you in a staring contest, but here we are.

name: Spider Pie
description: Made by spiders, of spiders, for spiders.

name: Demon Drink
description: A devilish brew, Demonkind often have it on special occassions or holidays.

name: Tooth Juice
description: Better tooth juice than tooth ache.

name: Eyeball Cocktail
description: Did that drink just wink at you?

name: Moon Cream
description: Whipped from the cream of a Demonic cow under the pale light of a blood moon... with a LOT of sugar. An elegant pastry worthy of royalty.

name: Eel Skewer
description: You wouldn't FEEL very good if you were skewered, either.

name: Monster Burger
description: You'd better eat it... before IT eats YOU!

name: Tentacle Fries
description: Crispy, fried and (thankfully) not squirming.

name: Sugar Teeth
description: You've heard of sweet tooths before, but this is a little ridiculous.

name: Cookie Spider
description: Yummy AND creepy!

name: Bag of Jelly Beans
description: Were they grown on a jelly farm?

name: Witch's Fingers
description: I hope they're not Catherine's!

name: Mini Jawbreaker
description:
Breaks mini jaws.

This sugary candy is likely to give you a sugar rush!

name: Mango Taffy
description:
Taffy is great, you just have to chew it. A lot.

This sugary candy is likely to give you a sugar rush!

name: Grape Taffy
description:
Taffy is great, you just have to chew it. A lot.

This sugary candy is likely to give you a sugar rush!

name: Raspberry Taffy
description:
Taffy is great, you just have to chew it. A lot.

This sugary candy is likely to give you a sugar rush!

name: Strawberry Candy Drop
description:
A little candy, wrapped up in a cute fruit foil.

This sugary candy is likely to give you a sugar rush!

name: Orange Candy Drop
description:
A little candy, wrapped up in a cute fruit foil.

This sugary candy is likely to give you a sugar rush!

name: Blueberry Candy Drop
description:
A little candy, wrapped up in a cute fruit foil.

This sugary candy is likely to give you a sugar rush!

name: Snow Cone
description: Best enjoyed on hot summer days, but whenever else is fine, too.

name: Strawberry Salad
description: Sweet and refreshing, a perfect way to start the day!

name: Deviled Eggs
description: The only thing evil about these is their delicious taste!

name: Mushroom Toast
description: Is this fine dining... or is it a failed sandwich?

name: Hummus
description: A delightful snack, perfect for chips, crackers, and most other dippable foods.

name: Spicy Noodles
description: Woah, that's hot! The smell alone is making me cry!

name: Short Ribs
description: Perfectly cooked, the meat is practically falling off the bone.

name: Grilled Pineapple
description: They say you can grill just about anything, but should you?

name: Squid Tacos
description: These could use a bit more ink.

name: Stuffed Peppers
description: Overflowing with delicious flavors, just one isn't enough!

name: Butternut Mac and Cheese
description: When in doubt, add cheese!

name: Gnocchi
description: These pasta dumplings go well in just about any sauce.

name: Eggplant Ravioli
description: Little pockets of time, love, and eggplant.

name: Chili
description: A hearty meal that will leave you satisfied for hours after.

name: Charcuterie Board
description: A board filled with various snacks, perfect for a party, or just for me.

name: Frostfin Cocktail
description: This drink will make you the talk of any party!

name: Blizzard Berry Stew
description: This stew will cool you down after just one bite. Brrrr!

name: Yam Fettuccine Alfredo
description: This pasta dish isn't actually pasta, the noodles are made with yams!

name: Kiwi Juice
description: With a gentle citrus undertone, this juice would go great in a fruit punch.

name: Kraken Kale Seeds
description: If you're not careful, this bizarre stalk will stick right to your fingers!

name: Moonplant Seeds
description: Crescent-shaped seeds that grow under the light of the moon.

name: Tombmelon Seeds
description: Filled with sweet juice, these plants might look spooky but taste great.

name: Razorstalk Seeds
description: Looking more like thorns than seeds, it's the plant of choice within the Withergate royal gardens.

name: Wind Chime Seeds
description: Ethereal pitcher plants that emit a lovely chime as they shake gently in the breeze.

name: Acorn Seeds
description: Rustic nuts that are enjoyed by Elves and squirrels alike.

name: Turnip Seeds
description: Turn these seeds into turnip!

name: Heat Fruit Seeds
description: Just because it's a fruit doesn't mean it can't bring the heat. A staple in the Southern Isles.

name: Kale Seeds
description: Suspiciously similar to what I imagine a grass seed looks like...

name: Armoranth Seeds
description: These seeds are as hard as stone. Or, maybe more accurately, armor.

name: Garlic Seeds
description: A natural vampire repellent.

name: Mango Seeds
description: These seeds do best in tropical soil, but Sun Haven is southern enough in its warmer seasons.

name: Brr-Nana
description: Someone cultivated a species of banana capable of growing in the frigid Northern Region. Natural banana ice cream!

name: Orchid Seeds
description: Orchids are a customary gift when visiting old friends.

name: Red Rose Seeds
description: Perhaps the most romantic of all the flowers.

name: Blue Rose Seeds
description: Blue roses don't occur naturally in the wild, it took years of special growing to develop roses of such a color.

name: Daisy Seeds
description: Easy to plant and grow, daisies are popular among beginner gardeners.

name: Brr-Nana Seeds
description: Banana seeds look funny enough already, but these ones are downright crazy!

name: Animal Food
description: A special blend, formulated for every type of farm animal.

name: Animal Name Tag
description: This special tag that can be used to give your pets and barn animals a name of their own.

name: Rainbow Trout
description: It may not be every hue of the rainbow, but it's still pretty colorful for a fish.

name: Gold Fish
description: Sometimes kept in glass bowls, these fish can actually grow quite large in open water.

name: Streamline Cod
description: Its white and flaky meat makes this fish perfect for frying.

name: Catfish
description: It doesn't look anything like a cat!

name: Pygmy Tuna
description: It might be a big fish, but it's a small fry compared to its deep ocean cousins!

name: Bonemouth Bass
description: The perfect fish, if you happen to be a dog.

name: Deadeye Shrimp
description: Thankfully it's out of ammo!

name: Robed Parrotfish
description: Polly want a lure?

name: Horsefish
description: If hay is for horses, then what is for horsefishes?

name: Frilled Betta
description: A proud betta fish with beautiful fins, this fierce fish is no stranger to an underwater duel!

name: Axolotl
description: These strange looking salamanders reach adulthood without ever undergoing metamorphosis. They're literally just a big baby!

name: Water Bear
description: In the old demon tongue this creature is known as a "tardigrade", it's common name is way cuter, though.

name: Electric Eel
description: Trust us, you're a lot better off never finding out just why they call it an 'electric' eel.

name: Redfinned Pincher
description: This species of piranha has adapted to living in Withergate waters by learning one rule: Eat or be eaten.

name: Brain Jelly
description: Brain jellies are the world's smartest jellyfish. Considering other jellyfish don't have brains, though, this isn't exactly an achievement.

name: Mummy Trout
description: Remember to remove the bandages prior to cooking.

name: Kraken
description: An immature kraken. In a few thousand years, this one will totally be worth releasing on your enemies.

name: Sea Bat
description: (Un)fun fact: each of this fish's 6,790 frills are incredibly venomous!

name: Popeye Goldfish
description: This fish's crazy eyes gives it excellent vision, making it great at spotting prey- or your hook!

name: Clown Fish
description: Tell us a joke, clown fish. ...Oh wait, fish can't talk.

name: Black Bass
description: Caught for sport in many areas of the world, many new anglers are excited to catch this fish for the first time.

name: Salmon
description: Commonly found in rivers, though this fish is no stranger to lakes, ponds, oceans, extra big puddles, etc...

name: Scarffish
description: It looks warm and fuzzy, but it's actually wet and slimy. Sorry.

name: Scorching Squid
description: A migrant squid from the distant Magma Isles, a chain of ashy islands constantly being broken and reformed by underwater volcanic activity.

name: Searback
description: Its dorsal fins are on fire - literally! Hmm, it reminds you of a fire Elemental...

name: Butterflyfish
description: Did it come from a sea cocoon?

name: Tadpole
description: Just a tad lad.

name: Hayfish
description: Hay is for horses. And apparently fish.

name: Acorn Anchovy
description: Perhaps the world's least favorite pizza topping.

name: Oak Tree Seeds
description: Shiny green acorns, they may be small right now but they'll sprout into mighty oak trees once planted.

name: Wood Floor Tile
description: Wooden tiles specially treated to work as flooring.

name: Stone Floor Tile
description: Stone cut to uniform tiles, these would make an excellent pathway or floor.

name: Workshop Floor Tile
description: Stone tiles set tightly together, making them easy to sweep after a crafting project.

name: Wooden Plank Floor Tile
description: Wood processed into planks for a pleasantly smooth surface.

name: Brick Floor Tile
description: Classic red brick, sturdy and reliable.

name: White Stone Floor Tile
description: Clean and classy, these tiles are suited to a distinguished decorator.

name: Patterned Floor Tile
description: Thin stone tiles carefully lined in a pattern, this style of floor is very popular in the Eastern region.

name: Oak Plank Floor Tile
description: Dark wooden planks to add a dramatic flair to your space.

name: Sombasu's Fortune #1
description:
A great opportunity for love will present itself to you, but it will rely on you grabbing it...
...Your lucky numbers are 9, 37, 78...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #2
description:
You will befriend many animals to fill your stables, but beware... of the clean-up...
...Your lucky numbers are 4, 33,17...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #3
description:
A sizable fortune is waiting to be delivered to you, but the sender doesn't have a stamp to mail it...
...Your lucky numbers are 66, 23, 1...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #4
description:
Somewhere out there, a Snaccoon is waiting for you to feed it...
...Your lucky numbers are 83, 21, 67...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #5
description:
Come next dawn, you shall feel compelled to water any crops you are growing...
...Your lucky numbers are 17, 41, 36...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #6
description:
You will be blessed with immense fame and adoration from all stretches of the world... on the next sunny day in Withergate...
...Your lucky numbers are 12, 25, 14...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #7
description:
You will suddenly become horrifyingly aware that you have not bathed since arriving in Sun Haven...
...Your lucky numbers are 8, 3, 13...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #8
description:
You will feel compelled to sleep tonight by exactly midnight...
...Your lucky numbers are 2, 77, 32...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #9
description:
I see... farming... somewhere in your future...
...Your lucky numbers are 14, 37, 4...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #10
description:
You will own many outfits... but never change your underwear...
...Your lucky numbers are 7, 13, 18...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #11
description:
The spirits tell me... Sun Haven's General Store shall open for business at precisely 8 a.m. tomorrow...
...Your lucky numbers are 11, 24, 55...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #12
description:
The next time you cut down a tree, you shall find logs...
...Your lucky numbers are 16, 33, 56...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #13
description:
I hear two spirits... one tells me the next time you go fishing, you shall catch nothing. The other tells me that the next time you go fishing, you shall indeed catch a fish...
...The spirits won't come to an agreeance... that's just how it is sometimes...
...Your lucky numbers are 74, 5, 23...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #14
description:
When next you place items in your Shipping Portal, you shall receive a bounty of coins...
...Your lucky numbers are 25, 74, 38...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #15
description:
I see... in the distant future... the one called "Emmett"... still... in debt...
...Your lucky numbers are 63, 37, 19...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #16
description:
You will wonder what your lucky numbers mean...
...Your lucky numbers are 4, 21, 48...

name: Sombasu's Fortune #17
description:
I see you, walking on the beach... you feet get covered in sand. It is coarse and rough, irritating... and gets everywhere...
...Your lucky numbers are 16, 9, 71...

name: Slime Bed
description: A nice, comfy bed... covered in about three inches of slime.

name: Drum Set
description: A complete rock band drumkit, ready and waiting to annoy your neighbors on long jam sessions.

name: Amp
description: Eleven? This baby goes up to TWELVE.

name: Rockin' Poster
description: The band scene of the Great City is pushing boundaries and making waves, all the way across the Four Regions.

name: Jammin' Poster
description: Hey, this isn't a poster about jam at all.

name: Blue Electric Guitar
description: A brand new guitar that utilizes the power of electricity to ROCK.

name: Purple Electric Guitar
description: A brand new guitar that utilizes the power of electricity to ROCK.

name: Red Electric Guitar
description: A brand new guitar that utilizes the power of electricity to ROCK.

name: Acoustic Guitar
description: A style of guitar popular in the Western Region, it is the first real instrument many young musicians learn to play.

name: Halloween Fence
description: A metal fence wrought in the style of halloween, ideal for the spookiest of farms.

name: Uncommon Fish
description: Any uncommon fish

name: Empty Soda Can
description: The necessary vessel for soda storage.

name: Water Rune
description: A magical sealing rune, containing the element of water.

name: Fabled Silk
description: Silk so fine it was fabled to not truly exist... well, here it is!

name: Spooky Silk
description: As silky as it is spooky, or perhaps as spooky as it is silky.

name: Fabled Fabric
description: Fabric so perfectly woven that it exists only in the hushed fables passed around Nel'Varian sewing circles.

name: Nel'vari Quilt
description: Scores of Elven grannies have made this very same quilt for generations.

name: Uber Socks
description: Great and flamboozling things can come from a pair of uber socks.

name: Mana Infused Scarf
description: Just because you CAN mana infuse something doesn't mean you SHOULD.

name: Cozy Blanket
description: This blanket naturally heats itself!

name: Nivara Blanket
description: A blanket bearing the image of Nivara, World Dragon.

name: Spooky Fabric
description: Can fabric really be spooky? The answer is yes.

name: Mended Socks
description: Someone's claw poked a hole in this sock, but it's all better now.

name: Health Woven Scarf
description: A scarf woven with one's own vitality. Metal!

name: Wooly Blanket
description: A slightly itchy blanket that naturally heats itself!

name: Dynus Blanket
description: A blanket bearing the image of Dynus, Moon Dragon.

name: Withergate Quilt
description: Keeps a monsterfolk nice and warm on chilly haunted nights.

name: Earth Rune
description: A magical sealing rune, containing the element of earth.
